title: Shinsetsu na Otonari-san
synopsis: Shinozuka Takeshi and his family finally achieved their dream of owning a home. But their happiness was made possible by one person: their kind neighbor, Shirasawa! From helping with household adjustments to supporting them through child-rearing troubles and job searches, Shirasawaâ€™s generosity knew no bounds. As days turned into reliance, Takeshi grew uneasy, but by the time he realized things had gone too far, it was already.
